distinct
from nguoidung
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into nguoidung (nguoidung_id, nguoidung_password, nguoidung_full_name, nguoidung_email, nguoidung_phone_number, nguoidung_role, nguoidung_date_of_birth, nguoidung_address, nguoidung_gender, nguoidung_image, nguoidung_state) values (#{nguoidungId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungDateOfBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nguoidungAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nguoidungState,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update nguoidung
nguoidung_id = #{row.nguoidungId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_password = #{row.nguoidungPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_full_name = #{row.nguoidungFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_email = #{row.nguoidungEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_phone_number = #{row.nguoidungPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_role = #{row.nguoidungRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_date_of_birth = #{row.nguoidungDateOfBirth,jdbcType=DATE},
nguoidung_address = #{row.nguoidungAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_gender = #{row.nguoidungGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_image = #{row.nguoidungImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_state = #{row.nguoidungState,jdbcType=BIT},

update nguoidung set nguoidung_id = #{row.nguoidungId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_password = #{row.nguoidungPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_full_name = #{row.nguoidungFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_email = #{row.nguoidungEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_phone_number = #{row.nguoidungPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_role = #{row.nguoidungRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_date_of_birth = #{row.nguoidungDateOfBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, nguoidung_address = #{row.nguoidungAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_gender = #{row.nguoidungGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_image = #{row.nguoidungImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_state = #{row.nguoidungState,jdbcType=BIT}

update nguoidung
nguoidung_password = #{nguoidungPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_full_name = #{nguoidungFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_email = #{nguoidungEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_phone_number = #{nguoidungPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nguoidung_role = #{nguoidungRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where nguoidung_id = #{nguoidungId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update nguoidung set nguoidung_password = #{nguoidungPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_full_name = #{nguoidungFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_email = #{nguoidungEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_phone_number = #{nguoidungPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_role = #{nguoidungRole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_date_of_birth = #{nguoidungDateOfBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, nguoidung_address = #{nguoidungAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_gender = #{nguoidungGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_image = #{nguoidungImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nguoidung_state = #{nguoidungState,jdbcType=BIT} where nguoidung_id = #{nguoidungId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select nguoidung.nguoidung_id, nguoidung_full_name, nguoidung_email, nguoidung_phone_number, class_name, nguoidung_state, nguoidung_address, class_year from nguoidung, classes, class_detail where nguoidung.nguoidung_id = class_detail.nguoidung_id and classes.class_id = class_detail.class_id and nguoidung.nguoidung_role = "student" and classes.class_state =true

select nguoidung.nguoidung_id, nguoidung_full_name, nguoidung_email, nguoidung_phone_number, class_name, nguoidung_state, nguoidung_address, class_year from nguoidung, classes, class_detail where nguoidung.nguoidung_id = class_detail.nguoidung_id and classes.class_id = class_detail.class_id and nguoidung.nguoidung_role = "student" and classes.class_state =true order by classes.class_id

select nguoidung.nguoidung_id, nguoidung_full_name, nguoidung_email, nguoidung_phone_number, class_name, nguoidung_state, nguoidung_address, class_year from nguoidung, classes, class_detail where nguoidung.nguoidung_id = class_detail.nguoidung_id and classes.class_id = class_detail.class_id and nguoidung.nguoidung_role = "student" and classes.class_state =true order by nguoidung.nguoidung_state
